arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS: How Carlisle United fared against Chesterfield
arts.sum: Carlisle United lost 2-0 at home Chesterfield – here's how we rated the players at Brunton Park.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United stay bottom after slumping to defeat against Chesterfield
arts.sum: Carlisle United 0 Chesterfield 2: Carlisle's relegation worries showed no sign of easing as Chesterfield scored in either half to win.

arts.ttl: Dilan Markanday and Will Grigg fire Chesterfield to win at Carlisle
arts.sum: Markanday gave the visitors the lead midway through the first half and Grigg sealed the points with a second-half strike.

arts.ttl: Can Carlisle United sink the Spireites? Bookies' verdict
arts.sum: A look at the bookmakers' odds as Carlisle United take on Chesterfield at Brunton Park in League Two this afternoon.

arts.ttl: Sam's shown his mettle at Carlisle United - and an example to follow
arts.sum: JON COLMAN: Any survival struggle needs strong characters, and the way Lavelle has risen from hard times shows others something to emulate.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United target 'massive' home win in survival struggle
arts.sum: Mike Williamson admits a home win would be “massive” for Carlisle United today – in a battle he expects to go to the wire.

arts.ttl: Chesterfield No2 gives his view on Carlisle United survival chances
arts.sum: Chesterfield assistant boss Danny Webb feels Carlisle United won't be at the wrong end of League Two for too long.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United boss pipped to manager of month award
arts.sum: Carlisle United's Mike Williamson has been pipped to the League Two manager of the month award by Morecambe's Derek Adams

arts.ttl: Chesterfield's former Carlisle United man facing long lay-off
arts.sum: Ex-Carlisle United man Mike Jones will be among Chesterfield's absentees at Brunton Park this weekend as he faces a long injury lay-off.
